channel.title: Posts on Deep Space Man
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Deep Space Man

item.title: Chapter 1 - Saying Hello
item.description: Is it just me or is there someone here? The air feels like too thin to breathe. Earth, My Earth! It all seems so distant now. Like a tiny speck of dust in the endless canvas of numerous specks. My team arrives in two days. Only if my Outer Space Vehicle had not malfunctioned.. I have become a liability to everyone. huh! Perhaps This is the lack of oxygen talking. I have to conserve oxygen for the near future.

item.title: Chapter 2 - First contact?
item.description: Is there something out there? Someone (Or something) is watching me. Every step that I take, Every breath very drop of sweat on my sweat is noticed, recorded and analysed for what its wprth. Back in Earth-II, humans have been usd to surveilance. Privacy is a term least comprehended by folks cause there aint a thing called privacy at erth. CAms, sensors, “Edge Sensors”. Back in the 21st century, people used to talk a lot about those things.
